feed.title: Portage la Prairie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Portage la Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Portage Southport Airport 2:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain mixed with snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 19.
